the Pied Piper of Hamelin once upon a
time there was a town named Hamlin
the town was beautiful bustling with

happiness of the town was ruined by a
plague Lake of brats
there were rats everywhere so much so

of every size shape every age and color
nothing worked as a remedy not even the
cats were able to control the plague of
France

traditional dress but all red in color

in his hat
he went to the authorities and said ah I

option
soon the strange-looking man took out a
Pied Piper

the Pied Piper took them to the town's

over soon
the Pied Piper went to the authorities
